com.spotify.flo.contrib.styx

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spotify.flo.contrib.styx.Environment

  • public final class Environment
extends Object
    Sanitized Styx environment variables where key should match "^([a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)?$" and less than 64 characters, and value should match "^([a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)?$" and less than 64 characters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Map<String,String> getSanitizedEnv()
      Get sanitized Styx environment variables which are visible to containers launched by Styx: styx-component-id styx-workflow-id styx-parameter styx-trigger-id styx-trigger-type
      static Map<String,String> getSanitizedEnv(String keyPrefix)
      Get sanitized Styx environment variables which are visible to containers launched by Styx: ${keyPrefix}-styx-component-id ${keyPrefix}-styx-workflow-id ${keyPrefix}-styx-parameter ${keyPrefix}-styx-trigger-id ${keyPrefix}-styx-trigger-type

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getSanitizedEnv

        public static Map<String,String> getSanitizedEnv()
        Get sanitized Styx environment variables which are visible to containers launched by Styx:
        • styx-component-id
        • styx-workflow-id
        • styx-parameter
        • styx-trigger-id
        • styx-trigger-type
        Returns:
        Styx environment variables which are visible to containers launched by Styx

      • getSanitizedEnv

        public static Map<String,String> getSanitizedEnv(String keyPrefix)
        Get sanitized Styx environment variables which are visible to containers launched by Styx:
        • ${keyPrefix}-styx-component-id
        • ${keyPrefix}-styx-workflow-id
        • ${keyPrefix}-styx-parameter
        • ${keyPrefix}-styx-trigger-id
        • ${keyPrefix}-styx-trigger-type
        Parameters:
        keyPrefix - prefix added to the key
        Returns:
        Styx environment variables which are visible to containers launched by Styx
